pr_title: Refactor WebServer and split behaviour into handlers

timeline.message: Log name of disabled request handlers

Add injected RequestHandlers and module

RequestHandlers interface defines a handler for HTTP requests for
modular, pluggable Vertx request handlers. These can be provided by the
new RequestHandlersModule and injected into the WebServer to extend its
functionality.
